name: WastelandCourier
description:
Hovercar prototype. Travel between the vaults, buy and sell goods to earn more money. Currently, there is no way to spend it.

  • WASD - movement
  • Spacebar - brake and land
  • Left shift - boost

Project source: https://github.com/Sargonius/WastelandCourier (UE4.21) 
Mindmap with devtasks and stuff: https://mm.tt/1208580698?t=DsCMwdc9zB
